title: Create Geographic Projections with Python Matplotlib
description: This tutorial will guide you through the process of creating geographic projections using Python Matplotlib library. We will go through four possible projections and learn how to create them.

meta.title: Create Geographic Projections with Python Matplotlib
meta.description: Learn how to create geographic projections using Python Matplotlib library in this comprehensive tutorial.
meta.keywords: python, matplotlib, geographic projections, aitoff, cartography
